item.title: [Off-Nominal] 229 - 40% Rule (with Jeff Hill)
item.description: Jake and Anthony are joined by Jeff Hill, Chairman of SATELLITE, to talk about their upcoming event, SATShow Week 2026, and trends in the industry that are sure to be a focusâ€”direct-to-cell services, data centers in space, megaconstellations, and the defense market. item.title: [The Rest Is History] Greatest Paintings: Age of Enlightenment - Raeburn's Skating Minister
item.description:
How does Henry Raeburnâ€™s Skating Minister represent both the Scottish Enlightenment and the Romantic movement? In what ways does subject Reverend Robert Walkerâ€™s personal history connect to the famous Dutch Golden Age? And, how did a controversy about the most reproduced image in ScotlandÂ traumatise the Scottish national identity?Â
In this new The Rest Is History Club series, Tom is joined by art critic and author Laura Cumming to discuss the histories behind famous paintings and put them in their historical contexts.
To hear the full episode, and all the other exclusive new episodes from Laura and Tom's paintingsÂ series, coming out every Wednesday for the next four weeks, join The Rest is History Club atÂ therestishistory.com
